item.title: ELI5: Epic vs Apple and Google
item.description: @jpmens asked on Twitter: What is Fortnite? #outingmyself Assuming XKCD 1053 . Fortnite Fortnite is a game made by Epic Games. They also make the Unreal Engine, which powers many modern computer games. Fortnite together with Roblox and Minecraft it is the set of games played most by people under 20. You want to follow Matthew Ball . Fortnite is a Battle Royal game, a 1st person shooter, in which a matchmaker puts you together with a set of other people of similar skill, drops you into an arena of ever shrinking size.
